GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to invalidate dcc->f2fs_issue_discard in error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit 865bb7b5a7deeb0e5afbd82381d52d38825dc64d, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 4d67490498acb4ffcef5ba7bc44990d46e66a44c. For more details please see the references link.
